comment._content: College St looking south-ish? Hyde Park on the right. Boomerang St (see tram lines) on the left. 1917 interactive map - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-gmod71-a3-sd&rg...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Thank you for your suggestion beachcomberaustralia. We also thought it may be the area around St Mary's Cathedral, where Hospital Road and Art Gallery Road meet.
